alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 3:32PM AKST until March 08 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed freezing rain, sleet and snow. Ice accumulations of a light glaze, and snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches are expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed freezing rain, sleet and snow will continue this afternoon. A light glaze of ice is expected. The precipitation will change to all snow late this afternoon, with snow tapering off tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
